product_name: The North Face Hedgehog Guide GTX Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: The women's Hedgehog Guide GTX hiking shoes from The North Face blend light-hiker flexibility and comfort with rugged, waterproof performance for demanding use. Synthetic leather uppers with nylon mesh panels are flexible, lightweight and durable for breathable, comfortable use on the trail. Reinforced toe boxes protect uppers from abrasion; gusseted and padded tongues keep out debris and add comfort. Polyurethane-coated leather toe caps protect shoes. Seam-sealed Gore-Tex(R) XCR(R) inserts with wicking nylon linings offer waterproof protection while allowing your moisture vapor to escape. Removable EVA footbeds feature forefoot and heel cushioning pads along with built-up heel cradles for enhanced support. Dual-density EVA midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and shock absorption; heels feature a stiffened cradle to help center the heel and enhance stabilty. Thermoplastic urethane plates increase shoe stability and protection from uneven terrain. The Hedgehog Guide GTX hiking shoes for women feature lightweight Vibram(R) rubber outsoles to supply dependable traction on all-mountain terrain.
short_description: The women's Hedgehog Guide GTX hiking shoes from The North Face blend light-hiker flexibility and comfort with rugged, waterproof performance for demanding use.
